subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Youkilis, who came into the game with .301 career average against the Yankees, hit a tiebreaking grand slam off Ivan Nova, who has won only one of his last eight starts.
snippet: Kevin Youkilis, who came into the game with .301 career average against the Yankees, hit a tiebreaking grand slam off Ivan Nova, who has won only one of his last eight starts.
